channel.title: Banning _____ because _____2 said so
channel.description:
It seems people have been banning others without any proof, just because someone says they broke the rules. First off, the example I just heard about wasn't even against the rules really, so I'm going to be unbanning the person in a few minutes.
I'd also just like to say, make sure people [b][u]make a report[/u][/b] before you ban them, you can't just listen to someone saying 'ban this person because they did this to me', because that doesn't give us any time to evaluate what happens, or even keep record of it.
